name: Connection Count HyperLogLog
description: Connection Count tracks the number of unique destination IP addresses connected to by each source IP.  This analyzer uses a specialized data structure called the HyperLogLog to efficiently store the distinct IP addresses.  HyperLogLog is a type of “sketch” algorithm which uses probabilistic hashing to minimize the space required to store large sets.

features.since: last time the counter was reset
features.count: The count of unique IP addresses connected to
